languages.text: "Мне не хочется рисковать жизнью в этом обряде, да и поиски мятежников уже порядком утомили".
"I am reluctant to risk my life for this ritual, and the search for the rebels has become quite tiresome as well."
languages.original_text: "Мне не хочется рисковать жизнью в этом обряде, да и поиски мятежников уже порядком утомили".

traits.locale_text: "I am reluctant to risk my life for this ritual, and the search for the rebels has become quite tiresome as well."
"The risk is too great, it seems. We will not perform the ritual."
"I am reluctant to risk my life for this ritual, and the search for the rebels has become quite tiresome as well."
"I am reluctant to risk my life for this ritual, and the search for the rebels has become quite tiresome as well."
"I am reluctant to risk my life for this ritual, and the search for the rebels has become quite tiresome as well."
"I am reluctant to risk my life for this ritual, and the search for the rebels has become quite tiresome as well."
"It seems the risk is too great. We will not perform the ritual."
"I am reluctant to risk my life for this ritual, and the search for the rebels has become quite tiresome as well."

languages.text: «No quiero arriesgar mi vida por este ritual, y la búsqueda de rebeldes se ha vuelto tediosa».
languages.original_text: "I am reluctant to risk my life for this ritual, and the search for the rebels has become quite tiresome as well."

traits.locale_text: «No quiero arriesgar mi vida por este ritual, y la búsqueda de rebeldes se ha vuelto tediosa».

languages.text: 「どうやらリスクが高すぎるな。反逆者たちの捜索も、ずいぶんと骨が折れるようになってきた。」
languages.original_text: "I am reluctant to risk my life for this ritual, and the search for the rebels has become quite tiresome as well."

traits.locale_text: 「どうやらリスクが高すぎるな。反逆者たちの捜索も、ずいぶんと骨が折れるようになってきた。」

languages.text: “我可不打算为了这个仪式冒生命危险，而且搜查叛徒这件事情也开始变得无聊了。”
languages.original_text: "I am reluctant to risk my life for this ritual, and the search for the rebels has become quite tiresome as well."

traits.locale_text: “我可不打算为了这个仪式冒生命危险，而且搜查叛徒这件事情也开始变得无聊了。”

languages.text: "Ich habe keine Lust, mein Leben für dieses Ritual zu riskieren, und die Suche nach den Rebellen erweist sich auch als ausgesprochen mühsam."
languages.original_text: "I am reluctant to risk my life for this ritual, and the search for the rebels has become quite tiresome as well."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe keine Lust, mein Leben für dieses Ritual zu riskieren, und die Suche nach den Rebellen erweist sich auch als ausgesprochen mühsam."

languages.text: « Je n'ai guère envie de risquer ma vie pour ce rituel, et je commence à en avoir assez de traquer ces rebelles. »
languages.original_text: "I am reluctant to risk my life for this ritual, and the search for the rebels has become quite tiresome as well."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai guère envie de risquer ma vie pour ce rituel, et je commence à en avoir assez de traquer ces rebelles. »

languages.text: "Bu ayin için hayatımı riske atmak istemiyorum, isyancıları aramak da oldukça yorucu olmaya başladı."
languages.original_text: "I am reluctant to risk my life for this ritual, and the search for the rebels has become quite tiresome as well."

traits.locale_text: "Bu ayin için hayatımı riske atmak istemiyorum, isyancıları aramak da oldukça yorucu olmaya başladı."
